CANOpen Device Node

Device Node contains the CANOpen ID, PDOs, NMT and SDOs for a given CANOpen slave device.

What do you want to do?

Duplicate Device Node

With CANOpen, there are often multiple slaves that have the same configuraiton but with a different device ID. To duplicate the settings of a configured node, right-click the device node in the configuration tree and select Duplicate Device Node from the shortcut menu. This will allow the user to enter the new device node ID and duplicate the settings of the previously selected device for the new device.

Refresh Device Node

This is a place holder that currently does nothing.

Delete multiple items

To delete multiple items, right-click the object in the configuration tree and select Delete Multiple Items from the shortcut menu.
